column2: @Kediri_020 @alansilbert @MarkYusko BTC may be limited in supply. But the potential for new digital currencies is literally infinite.
@MarkYusko Thanks. Let me clear: I like BTC. I support denationalized currency..I've read more Hayek than any other… https://t.co/EVO7IzqgIe

@alansilbert @MarkYusko you're comparing the products BTC and tulips...compare the markets  you'll see they're very similar
Anyone notice the last 6 months the #USD has plummeted  and at the same time Bitcoin $BTC has soared? Remember how currencies work..
